title: Red Bull owner Dietrich Mateschitz dies, company says
description: The owner and co-founder of the sports drink company Red Bull has died, the company announced Saturday.

title: US home prices are finally falling. But how low will they go?
description: The US housing market is in the midst of a major shift. After two years of stratospheric price appreciation, home prices have peaked and are on their way back down.

title: Iranian rock climber Elnaz Rekabi thanks supporters on social media, as official denies she is under house arrest
description: A female Iranian rock climber, who competed without a hijab at an international competition in South Korea, has taken to social media to thank her supporters -- amid conflicting reports over whether she has been put under house arrest.

title: Giorgia Meloni is set to be sworn in as Italy's prime minister. Some fear the hard-right turn she's promised to take
description: Giorgia Meloni, the hard-right leader who is due to be sworn in as Italy's first female prime minister, won the election on a campaign built around a promise to block migrant ships and support for traditional "family values" and anti-LGBTQ themes.

title: Meet the CNN Hero working to stop violence and rebuild lives on the South Philly streets where he once sold drugs
description: Tyrique Glasgow's life has always revolved around his South Philadelphia neighborhood, and gun violence has always been a part of it.
